name: Hoppy Horizon IPA
description: A West Coast-style IPA with bright citrus notes and a crisp, hoppy finish. Perfect for hop heads seeking a classic American IPA experience.

tastingNotes.appearance: Golden amber with a persistent white head
tastingNotes.aroma: Intense grapefruit, pine, and tropical fruit notes
tastingNotes.flavor: Bold hop bitterness balanced with caramel malt sweetness
tastingNotes.overall: A well-balanced IPA that showcases American hop varietals

name: Midnight Velvet Stout
description: Rich and velvety imperial stout with notes of dark chocolate, coffee, and vanilla. A decadent brew for stout enthusiasts.

tastingNotes.appearance: Pitch black with a tan head
tastingNotes.aroma: Roasted coffee, dark chocolate, and vanilla
tastingNotes.flavor: Complex layers of chocolate, espresso, and subtle dark fruits
tastingNotes.mouthfeel: Full-bodied and creamy with low carbonation
tastingNotes.overall: A luxurious stout perfect for sipping

name: Summer Breeze Wheat
description: A refreshing German-style wheat beer with hints of banana and clove. Light, crisp, and perfect for warm weather.

tastingNotes.appearance: Cloudy golden yellow with a fluffy white head
tastingNotes.flavor: Smooth wheat character with banana esters and subtle spice
tastingNotes.mouthfeel: Light to medium body with high carbonation
tastingNotes.overall: A classic hefeweizen that's refreshing and approachable

name: Amber Waves Lager
description: A smooth, malty lager with toasted bread notes and a clean finish. Traditional Austrian-style brewing at its finest.

tastingNotes.appearance: Clear amber color with off-white head
tastingNotes.aroma: Toasted malt, light caramel, and floral hops
tastingNotes.flavor: Balanced malt sweetness with subtle hop bitterness
tastingNotes.overall: A sessionable lager with excellent drinkability

name: Citrus Sunrise Pale Ale
description: A bright and zesty pale ale featuring Citra and Mosaic hops. Bursting with citrus and tropical fruit flavors.

tastingNotes.appearance: Light amber with a white head
tastingNotes.overall: A refreshing pale ale perfect for any occasion

name: Belgian Bliss Tripel
description: A traditional Belgian tripel with complex fruity esters and a dry finish. Deceptively smooth for its strength.

tastingNotes.appearance: Pale gold with rocky white head
tastingNotes.flavor: Fruity esters, honey sweetness, and peppery finish

name: Raspberry Tart Sour
description: A kettle-soured ale with fresh raspberry puree. Tart, fruity, and refreshing with a beautiful pink hue.

tastingNotes.overall: A fruit-forward sour that's approachable and refreshing

name: Smoke & Mirrors Porter
description: A robust porter with subtle smoke character from beechwood-smoked malt. Complex and warming.

tastingNotes.flavor: Balanced smoke with dark malt sweetness
tastingNotes.overall: A unique porter with intriguing smoke notes
